verses.verse: Thus the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after they had <S%H3318>come<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"Now, let the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>observe<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> at its <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>time.<s%>

"On the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> at <S%H6153>twilight,<s%> you shall <S%H6213>observe<s%> it at its <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>time;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>observe<s%> it according to <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and according to <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H4941>ordinances.<s%>"
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>told<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H6213>observe<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover.<s%>

And they <S%H6213>observed<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>[month,<s%>] on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the month, at <S%H6153>twilight,<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai;<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did.<s%>

But there were [some] <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H2931>unclean<s%> because of [the] <S%H5315>dead<s%> <S%H5315>person,<s%> so that they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H6213>observe<s%> <S%H6453>Passover<s%> on that <S%H3117>day;<s%> so they <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> on that <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "[Though] we are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> because of [the] <S%H5315>dead<s%> <S%H5315>person,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> are we <S%H1639>restrained<s%> from <S%H7126>presenting<s%> the <S%H7133>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> at its <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>time<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> therefore <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H5975>"Wait,<s%> and I will <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H4100>what<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6680>command<s%> concerning you."
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>'If<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> of you <S%H176>or<s%> of your <S%H1755>generations<s%> <S%H1961>becomes<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> because of a [dead] <S%H5315>person,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> is on a <S%H7350>distant<s%> <S%H1870>journey,<s%> he may, however, <S%H6213>observe<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'In the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> at <S%H6153>twilight,<s%> they shall <S%H6213>observe<s%> it; they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it with <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread<s%> and <S%H4844>bitter<s%> <S%H4844>herbs.<s%>

'They shall <S%H7604>leave<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of it <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7665>break<s%> a <S%H6106>bone<s%> of it; according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2708>statute<s%> of the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> they shall <S%H6213>observe<s%> it.

'But the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is <S%H2889>clean<s%> and is not on a <S%H1870>journey,<s%> and yet <S%H2308>neglects<s%> to <S%H6213>observe<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover,<s%> that <S%H5315>person<s%> shall then be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H9415>people,<s%> for he did not <S%H7126>present<s%> the <S%H7133>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> at its <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>time.<s%> That <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H2399>sin.<s%>

'And <S%H3588>if<s%> an <S%H1616>alien<s%> <S%H1481>sojourns<s%> <S%H854>among<s%> you and <S%H6213>observes<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> according to the <S%H2708>statute<s%> of the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> and according to its <S%H4941>ordinance,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> he shall <S%H6213>do;<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2708>statute,<s%> both for the <S%H1616>alien<s%> and for the <S%H249>native<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>' "

Now on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was <S%H6965>erected<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> and in the <S%H6153>evening<s%> it was like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1242>morning.<s%>
<S%H3651>So<s%> it was <S%H8548>continuously;<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> would <S%H3680>cover<s%> it [by day,] and the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And <S%H6310>whenever<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was <S%H5927>lifted<s%> from <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H168>tent,<s%> <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> would then <S%H5265>set<s%> out; and in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>settled<s%> <S%H7931>down,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> would <S%H2583>camp.<s%>

At the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> would <S%H5265>set<s%> out, and at the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> they would <S%H2583>camp;<s%> as <S%H3605>long<s%> <S%H3117><s%> as the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>settled<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> they <S%H2583>remained<s%> <S%H2583>camped.<s%>

Even when the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H748>lingered<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> would <S%H8104>keep<s%> the Lord's <S%H4931>charge<s%> and not <S%H5265>set<s%> out.

If <S%H3426>sometimes<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H1961>remained<s%> a <S%H4557>few<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> they <S%H2583>remained<s%> <S%H2583>camped.<s%> Then <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> they <S%H5265>set<s%> out.

If <S%H3426>sometimes<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H1961>remained<s%> from <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1242>morning,<s%> when the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was <S%H5927>lifted<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> they would <S%H5265>move<s%> out; <S%H176>or<s%> [if it remained] in the <S%H3119>daytime<s%> and at <S%H3915>night,<s%> whenever the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was <S%H5927>lifted,<s%> they would <S%H5265>set<s%> out.

<S%H176>Whether<s%> it was two <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H3117>year<s%> that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H748>lingered<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> <S%H7931>staying<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> it, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>remained<s%> <S%H2583>camped<s%> and did not <S%H5265>set<s%> out; but when it was <S%H5927>lifted,<s%> they did <S%H5265>set<s%> out.

At the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> they <S%H2583>camped,<s%> and at the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> they <S%H5265>set<s%> out; they <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H4931>charge,<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the Lord <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
